item.title: Building a Spotify Playlist Recommendation Model With R
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando Problem & Solution Statements Many companies and products you interact with every day include some type of Recommendation system. For example, the Netflix app recommends movies and shows for you based on your history as well as what is trending. Amazon lists recommendations based on products that compliment current or previous purchases. How are these recommendation algorithms developed? This tutorial shows you how to create create a Spotify Recommendation Algorithm in R.

item.title: Loading Multiple Files from Various Folders in R
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando Problem Statement This tutorial shows you how to load multiple files from multiple folders using R. As a bonus, this article will also show you how to add the folder and file names to the tibble. Load Libraries Tidyverse and readxl are the only libraries required for this tutorial. library(tidyverse) library(readxl) Data Description In this example, Spotify playlist data was downloaded using Exportify.
